amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that the SCRUB Act will not in any way weaken the protections afforded by noise restriction policies at and around airports.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 230 (Roll no. 108).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 230 (Roll no. 108).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Krishnamoorthi.
